attributes.action: Initiate a 'Blue Nose Day' to aid British Pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Public are charitably supporting 'Red Nose Day' in favour of African Children. Many pensioners in this country have been unable to afford heating in their homes due to the exhorbitant rises in fuel prices. Support them by creating a 'Blue Nose Day' - remember 'Charity begins at home'.

rejection.details: Charity events, such as 'Red Nose Day', are not set up by government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
